resources.string: Error generating QR code, please try again
Please generate you QR by tapping the button below
It seems that you have permanently declined record audio permission. You can go to the app settings to grant it.
This app needs acces to record audio so you can start to find your phone listening to your whistles or claps
It seems that you have permanently declined camera permission. You can go to the app settings to grant it
This app requires the camera permission to remain functional, it allow the user to scan QR codes
